channel.title: attack.t1027.001 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1027.001 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Binary Padding
item.description: Adversaries may use binary padding to add junk data and change the on-disk representation of malware. This rule detect using dd and truncate to add a junk data to file.

item.title: Binary Padding
item.description: Adversaries may use binary padding to add junk data and change the on-disk representation of malware. This rule detect using dd and truncate to add a junk data to file.

item.title: Failed Code Integrity Checks
item.description: Code integrity failures may indicate tampered executables.
